Company: University of California San Francisco Health d/b/a UCSF Medical Center
Description: On September 28, 2016, University of California San Francisco Health d/b/a UCSF Medical Center (UCSF), entered into a $1,443,016 settlement agreement with OIG. The settlement agreement resolved allegations that UCSF submitted claims for "new patient" evaluation and management outpatient clinic visits using Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) codes 99203-99205 when the patients at issue were actually "established patients" and, thus, UCSF should have submitted those claims using the lower-paying HCPCS codes 99213-99215.
Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office of Inspector General
Info Source: https://oig.hhs.gov/fraud/enforcement/cmp/cmp-ae.asp
